DOC.brief_summary: In this study the investigators aimed to study the ventilatory performance of different interfaces during NPPV delivering.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Different Interfaces for Noninvasive Positive Pressure Ventilation (NPPV)
DOC.detailed_description: We will test the ventilatory performance in term of ventilatory pattern, muscle effort and gas exchange of different interfaces for NPPV.
